thread.title: Which Cryptos Are Whales Buying for the Bull Run Solana (SOL), Lightchain AI, Kaspa?
thread.title_full: Which Cryptos Are Whales Buying for the Bull Run Solana (SOL), Lightchain AI, Kaspa?

title: Which Cryptos Are Whales Buying for the Bull Run Solana (SOL), Lightchain AI, Kaspa?
text:
The crypto market seems to be gearing up for a potential bull run, and whales—those big-time investors—are already making strategic moves to maximize their returns.
Among their top picks? Solana (SOL) for its lightning-fast transactions, XRP for its impressive cross-border payment solutions, Lightchain AI for its exciting AI-blockchain integration, and Kaspa (KAS) for its unique blockDAG architecture.
Let’s dive into what makes these cryptos the favorites for whales in this bullish climate.
Solana (SOL) Speed and Scalability Champion
Solana has made a name as one of the quickest and largest blockchains in the market. With speed of up to 65,000 trades each second (TPS) and cheap costs, Solana is now a favorite for DeFi sites, NFTs and games on blockchain.
T͏he system’s aim on easy-use growth and smooth joining has drawn big dApp plans, making SOL a must-have in whale stash. As the area grows with fresh ideas like Solana Pay and Saga phones, whales view Solana as a safe buy with good long-term chances during upcoming bull run.
Kaspa (KAS) Leader in Blockchain Innovation
Kaspa has emerged as a favorite among tech-focused investors for its blockDAG (Directed Acyclic Graph) architecture, which enhances scalability without compromising security. This unique approach allows Kaspa to process multiple blocks simultaneously, creating a high-throughput network with low confirmation times.
Kaspa’s emphasis on decentralized mining and community-driven development has drawn the attention of whales who value projects with strong technical foundations. As adoption grows, KAS is poised to become a key player in the next phase of blockchain evolution.
Lightchain AI Revolutionizing Blockchain with AI Integration
Lightchain AI (LCAI) is an exciting platform that brings together artificial intelligence and blockchain technology to offer innovative solutions across a range of industries. With a capped supply of 10 billion tokens, its tokenomics are designed for sustainability and fairness, with allocations for presale, staking rewards, liquidity, marketing, the team, and treasury.
The roadmap takes us from prototype development all the way to global adoption, with a bold mission to transform decentralized AI applications. From healthcare and finance to supply chain and the creative economy, LCAI’s use cases show just how versatile it is in solving real-world problems.
A standout feature is the Memecoin Launchpad, which gives creators the tools to design, launch, and monetize meme-driven projects—fueling creativity and innovation across the ecosystem.
By combining cutting-edge AI with blockchain, Lightchain AI is carving out a unique space as a game-changer in the digital world.
https://lightchain.ai/lightchain-whitepaper.pdf
